data.message: Thank you FB. My sisters & I have found our long lost brother whom resides in England. I just recently found my grand daughter that I did not know I had. I love how I can stay in touch daily w/Family & Friends near & far. Without you connecting w/them would not be possible.Best regards to FB

replies.message: What a great story, Kimberly! We are so happy you've reconnected with your long lost brother and found your granddaughter. We love to hear interesting stories like yours and hear more about your experience with Facebook. If you’re interested in submitting this story to Facebook Stories, you can do so at: http://www.facebookstories.com/yourstory. Thanks for sharing! -Sarah
